title: Gertrude's Cat

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Gertrude's CatThe RuneScape Classic Wiki also has an article on: classicrsw:Gertrude's Cat
 This quest has a quick guide found here.
It briefly summarises the steps needed to complete the quest.
Gertrude's Cat (#49)
Released 28 July 2003 (Update)
Members Yes
Quest series None
Official difficulty Novice
Lead developer(s) Tom W

Gertrude's Cat is a short quest in which you have to find Fluffs, a lost pet cat owned by Gertrude. Completion of the quest allows you to adopt a feline companion of your very own.

Contents

  • 1 Details
  • 2 Walkthrough
    • 2.1 Starting out
    • 2.2 The secret playground (Lumber Yard)
  • 3 Rewards
  • 4 Required for completing
  • 5 Transcript

Details[edit | edit source]

Start point Go to Gertrude's house which is just west of Varrock.
Official difficultyNovice
DescriptionGertrude has lost her cat Fluffs and desperately wants to find her. Can you help bring her home?
Official lengthVery Short
Requirements None
Items required
  • Bucket of milk
  • 100 coins
  • Seasoned sardine (Bought from the Grand Exchange) or alternatively:
    • Raw sardine (Caught or bought from Gerrant's Fishy Business.)
    • Doogle leaves (South of Gertrude's house)
Recommended
  • Skills necklace to teleport to Cooks' Guild
  • Varrock teleport
  • Lumberyard Teleport
  • Ring of charos (a) (lets you choose the colour of your kitten)
  • An axe (to complete an easy Varrock Diary task in the Lumber Yard)
Enemies to defeat None
{"requirements":"None","desc":"Gertrude has lost her cat Fluffs and desperately wants to find her. Can you help bring her home?","difficulty":"Novice","kills":"None","name":"Gertrude's Cat","start":"Go to [[Gertrude]]'s house which is just west of [[Varrock]].","length":"Very Short","items":"* [[Bucket of milk]]\n* 100 [[coins]]\n* [[Seasoned sardine]] (Bought from the [[Grand Exchange]]) or alternatively:\n** [[Raw sardine]] (Caught or bought from [[Gerrant's Fishy Business.]])\n** [[Doogle leaves]] (South of [[Gertrude]]'s house)"}

Walkthrough[edit | edit source]

Starting out[edit | edit source]

Items needed: 100 coins.

Note: Before leaving Gertrude's house, pick up some doogle leaves to the south if you don't have a seasoned sardine already to save time later on.

Speak to Gertrude at her house west of Varrock, south of the Cooks' Guild, she will tell you that she has lost her cat, Fluffs. Gertrude will ask you to go and speak to her two children, Shilop and Wilough in Varrock Square.

Go to the Varrock Square and talk to either of the two boys. They will tell you about their secret playground, but they will not give you the location until you pay them. The player must pay them 100 coins.

Go to the Lumber Yard, north-east of Varrock, bring a raw sardine, a doogle leaf, and a bucket of milk.

Fluffs, located on the 1st floor[UK]2nd floor[US] in the Lumberyard.

The secret playground (Lumber Yard)[edit | edit source]

Items needed: Seasoned sardine OR raw sardine and doogle leaves, and a bucket of milk.
Items recommended: Lumberyard teleport and Varrock teleport. An axe to complete an easy Varrock Diary task.

At the Lumber Yard, climb-over the broken fence on the southern side. Go to the middle of the Lumber Yard and climb up the ladder. There you will find Gertrude's cat, Fluffs. First, try to pick-up the cat, she will hiss at you. Use a bucket of milk on her and try to pick her up again. She will still hiss. Use the doogle leaves on the raw sardine to make a seasoned sardine. Give Fluffs the seasoned sardine. Once again you will not be able to pick her up because the cat seems afraid to leave and in the distance you can hear kittens mewing...

Locations of all crates where kittens can potentially be found.

Go down the ladder and search through the nearby crates with the yellow "Search crate" option with the yellow "Mew!" above them. Searching the same crate repeatedly will not work. Keep searching until you find Fluffs' kitten; click on continue and the kitten appears in your inventory. If the kitten does not appear, log out and back in to trigger the event. Do not drop the kitten as you normally would, it will run away and you will have to find it again. With the kitten in your inventory, go back up the ladder and use it on Fluffs. Fluffs and the kitten run off home. Return to Gertrude to complete the quest.

Congratulations! Quest complete!

Note: A ring of charos (a) will allow you to chose the colour of your kitten upon quest completion.

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • 1 Quest point
  • 1,525 Cooking experience
  • Your own kitten
  • Chocolate cake
  • Stew
  • Gertrude will now sell kittens for you to raise for 100 coins each.

Note for ironmen: Keep the chocolate cake quest reward for the A Tail of Two Cats quest and the stew for the The Queen of Thieves quest.

Required for completing[edit | edit source]

Completion of Gertrude's Cat is required for the following:

  • Icthlarin's Little Helper
  • Recipe for Disaster - Freeing Evil Dave
  • Medium Varrock Diary - Select a colour for your kitten.

Transcript[edit | edit source]

This article on a quest has an associated dialogue page.
Click here for a transcript of possible conversations encountered throughout the quest.

'''Gertrude's Cat''' is a short [[quest]] in which you have to find [[Fluffs]], a lost pet cat owned by [[Gertrude]]. Completion of the quest allows you to adopt a feline companion of your very own.

==Details==
{{Quest details
|start = Go to [[Gertrude]]'s house which is just west of [[Varrock]].
|difficulty = Novice
|description = Gertrude has lost her cat Fluffs and desperately wants to find her. Can you help bring her home?
|length = Very Short
|items = 
* [[Bucket of milk]]
* 100 [[coins]]
* [[Seasoned sardine]] (Bought from the [[Grand Exchange]]) or alternatively:
** [[Raw sardine]] (Caught or bought from [[Gerrant's Fishy Business.]])
** [[Doogle leaves]] (South of [[Gertrude]]'s house)
|recommended = 
* [[Skills necklace]] to teleport to [[Cooks' Guild]]
* [[Varrock teleport]]
* [[Lumberyard Teleport]]
* [[Ring of charos (a)]] (lets you choose the colour of your [[kitten]])
* An [[axe]] (to complete an [[easy Varrock Diary]] task in the [[Lumber Yard]])
}}

==Walkthrough==
===Starting out===
{{Needed|100 [[coins]].}}

[[File:Gertrude chathead.png|left]]
'''Note: Before leaving Gertrude's house, pick up some [[doogle leaves]] to the south if you don't have a seasoned sardine already to save time later on.'''

Speak to [[Gertrude]] at her house west of [[Varrock]], south of the [[Cooks' Guild]], she will tell you that she has lost her cat, [[Fluffs]]. Gertrude will ask you to go and speak to her two children, [[Shilop]] and [[Wilough]] in [[Varrock Square]].

Go to the Varrock Square and talk to either of the two boys. They will tell you about their secret playground, but they will not give you the location until you pay them. The player must pay them {{NoCoins|100}} coins.

Go to the [[Lumber Yard]], north-east of Varrock, bring a [[raw sardine]], a [[doogle leaf]], and a [[bucket of milk]].
[[File:Gertrude's Cat - Fluffs.png|thumb|220px|Fluffs, located on the {{FloorNumber|uk=1}} in the Lumberyard.]]

===The secret playground (Lumber Yard)===
{{Needed|[[Seasoned sardine]] '''OR''' [[raw sardine]] and [[doogle leaves]], and a [[bucket of milk]].|recommended=[[Lumberyard teleport]] and [[Varrock teleport]]. An [[axe]] to complete an [[easy Varrock Diary]] task.}}

At the [[Lumber Yard]], climb-over the broken fence on the southern side. Go to the middle of the Lumber Yard and climb up the ladder. There you will find Gertrude's cat, [[Fluffs]]. First, try to pick-up the cat, she will hiss at you. Use a [[bucket of milk]] on her and try to pick her up again. She will still hiss. Use the [[doogle leaves]] on the [[raw sardine]] to make a [[seasoned sardine]]. Give Fluffs the seasoned sardine. Once again you will not be able to pick her up because the cat seems afraid to leave and in the distance you can hear kittens mewing...

{{Map|x:3315,y:3515,title:Crate|x:3298,y:3514,title:Crate|x:3303,y:3506,title:Crate|x:3307,y:3507,title:Crate|x:3305,y:3500,title:Crate|x:3310,y:3499,title:Crate|mtype=pin|icon=greenPin|caption=Locations of all crates where kittens can potentially be found.|align=right
}}

Go down the ladder and search through the nearby crates with the yellow "Search crate" option with the yellow "Mew!" above them. Searching the same crate repeatedly will not work. Keep searching until you find [[Fluffs' kitten]]; click on continue and the kitten appears in your inventory. If the kitten does not appear, log out and back in to trigger the event. Do '''not''' drop the kitten as you normally would, it will run away and you will have to find it again. With the kitten in your inventory, go back up the ladder and use it on Fluffs. Fluffs and the kitten run off home. Return to Gertrude to complete the quest.

'''Congratulations! Quest complete!'''

Note: A [[ring of charos (a)]] will allow you to chose the colour of your kitten upon quest completion.

==Rewards==
{{Quest rewards
|name = Gertrude's Cat
|image = [[File:Gertrude's Cat reward scroll.png|centre]]
|qp = 1
|rewards = 
*{{SCP|Cooking|1,525}} [[Cooking]] [[experience]]
*Your own [[kitten]]
*[[Chocolate cake]]
*[[Stew]]
*[[Gertrude]] will now sell kittens for you to raise for {{NoCoins|100}} coins each.
}}

Note for '''[[ironmen]]:''' Keep the [[chocolate cake]] quest reward for the [[A Tail of Two Cats]] [[quest]] and the [[stew]] for the [[The Queen of Thieves]] quest.

==Required for completing==
Completion of Gertrude's Cat is required for the following:
* [[Icthlarin's Little Helper]]
* [[Recipe for Disaster]] - [[Freeing Evil Dave]]
* [[Medium Varrock Diary]] - ''Select a colour for your kitten.''
